description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=2/3. Free the Condemned City from rotten zombies and loathsome bats. Featuring three amazing modes Deliverance, Mission and Weekend modes. Experience the ultimate sniping action and earn prestige points, awards and upgraded weapons.
description.short: Free the Condemned City from rotten zombies and loathsome bats. Featuring three amazing modes Deliverance, Mission and Weekend modes. Experience the ultimate sniping action and earn prestige points, awards and upgraded weapons.
